div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Slot|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Slot.serviceType` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Slot.serviceType` as `SourceIsBroaderThanTarget`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Slot to FHIR R4 Slot

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Slot to FHIR R4.
